Introducing Heart Analyzer Version 3! Features Include:
+ Re-designed Apple Watch app, now super fast and easier to navigate with swipe gestures!
+ Re-designed sleep analysis algorithm, able to support more irregular sleep pattern, just wear your Ap

Introducing Heart Analyzer Version 3! Features Include:
+ Re-designed Apple Watch app, now super fast and easier to navigate with swipe gestures!
+ Re-designed sleep analysis algorithm, able to support more irregular sleep pattern, just wear your Ap

+ How the app reads in your health data has been changed for faster performance and launch times
+ You can now view your active energy on a graph alongside your heart rate!

+ Complete re-design of the sleep view, I know many have been asking for this for a while so I hope this is what you had in mind!

+ More optimisation and speed improvements

+ Averaging features for day HR graphs now configurable
+ Ability to view 2 YEARS of HR data on the Long Term Graph
+ Rolling average options for the LT Graph -

We're back! Say hello to a release of Heart Analyzer, new from the ground up!
• Completely re-written in Swift 4, not a single line of code is the same
• The UI has been overhauled to be smoother and more intuitive
• There are many new features

We've made it, we're here! This is the last update for Heart Analyzer V6

Today we're thrilled to release Heart Analyzer V8
---------------------------------------------
This massive update includes:
• A completely re-designed app with new interfaces throughout
• Dark mode support and refined, cleaner iconography

Today we're thrilled to release Heart Analyzer V8
---------------------------------------------
This massive update includes:
• A completely re-designed app with new interfaces throughout
• Dark mode support and refined, cleaner iconography

This update includes a handful of fixes following the launch of Heart Analyzer V8:
• Fixed an issue preventing day graphs to present in landscape
• Fixed layout issues on various devices with a standard larger text size set
• Added support for pi

• Fixed layout issues on various devices with a standard larger text size set
• Added support for pi

• Overhaul of how charts are displayed for performance and efficiency
• Fixes a crash that could occur when viewing day charts in landscape
• Other smaller fixes

Heart Analyzer V8.1 introduces a refreshed Apple Watch app which features:
• A clean UI with big fonts and clear text
• More metrics with new graphs for the past 7 day Averages, Maximums and Minimums
• Heart Rate Variability, VO2Max and Workout H

• Heart Rate Variability, VO2Max and Workout H
